title: Bao Hulu De Mimi
synopsis: Elementary school student Wang Bao (Zhu Qilong) is innocent and lively and likes to fantasize. Whenever he encounters difficulties in study or troubles in his after-school life, he fantasizes about a magical baby appearing to help him achieve his goals easily. One day, while fishing, Wang Bao came across the legendary Bao Gourd (voiced by Chen Peisi), who was able to help the owner realize any wish. He was overjoyed. Bao Gourd not only helped Wang Bao catch fish, made advanced models, completed extracurricular homework, and transformed into various This shape makes him happy. Wang Bao’s rapid progress in the school surprised the students. Teacher Liu (Gigi Leung) also changed his original look at him, and Bao Hulu helped him show his power in the swimming pool and easily got the chance to join the school team. His life is closer to perfection. However, Wang Bao gradually discovered that Bao Hulu was originally indiscriminate and only knew how to obey blindly...(translated from douban)
background: This anime won The 26th China Film Golden Rooster Awards Best Children's Film.
